tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_card_disputes (
  dispute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  merchant_id INT,
  dispute_amount DECIMAL,
  dispute_reason TEXT,
  dispute_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CreditCardDisputes (
  dispute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  merchant_id INT NOT NULL,
  dispute_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  dispute_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE credit_card_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  customer_id UUID,
  merchant_id UUID,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE disputes (
  dispute_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  dispute_date DATE,
  customer_id UUID,
  merchant_id UUID,
  dispute_reason TEXT
);
